name: Electric Eel Style
description: You have learned how to harness electrical energy to momentarily disorient your foes.
prerequisites: Wis 13, Elemental Fist, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 5th.
benefit: You gain one additional Elemental Fist (Advanced Playerâ€™s Guide 158) attempt per day. While you are in this style, your Elemental Fist attack deals electricity damage. When a creature takes electricity damage from your Elemental Fist attack, you gain a +4 bonus for 1 round on combat maneuver checks to grapple the creature.
